attributes.action: fund the full cost for the development of a swimming pool and gym complex at Headley Court to support the recovery of injured servicemen and women returning from Iraq and Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Help for Heroes has taken the initiative to raise funds to build a swimming pool and gym to enable the rehabilitation of servicemen and women returning injured from Iraq and Afghanistan. This should be government funded- please support this so the Help for Heros money is not wasted on basic facilities that should be provided to enable fully recovery of those serving our country.
